tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_location VARCHAR(255),
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    sensor_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    reading_value FLOAT,
    reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Sensors (sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
 location VARCHAR(50),
 status BOOLEAN)

CREATE TABLE SensorData (data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 sensor_id INT,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 value FLOAT,
 FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES Sensors(sensor_id))

CREATE TABLE Dashboard (dashboard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 dashboard_name VARCHAR(50),
 layout JSON,
 widgets JSON)

CREATE TABLE sensors (
    sensor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sensor_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sensor_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT NOT NULL,
    data_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
    data_timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT NOT NULL,
    alert_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE dashboard (
    dashboard_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    dashboard_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    dashboard_description TEXT,
    dashboard_created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE sensors (
  sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_name TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_alerts (
  alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE dashboard_users (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT,
  email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE dashboard_logs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  action TEXT,
  user_id UUID
)
